titleStmt.title: Childrens talke, English & Latine divided into several clauses, wherein the prop[r]iety of both languages is kept ... / by Charles Hoole ...
titleStmt.author: Hoole, Charles, 1610-1667.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the Company of Stationers,

notesStmt.note: English and Latin in parallel columns.
Title on added t.p. in Latin: Pueriles confabulatiunculae, Anglo-Latinae.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
